thread.title: IBM gets a dose of the blues as it shifts its focus
thread.title_full: IBM gets a dose of the blues as it shifts its focus

title: IBM gets a dose of the blues as it shifts its focus
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now IBM gets a dose of the blues as it shifts its focus IBM is transforming itself from the 1990s, when Garry Kasparov played the IBM Deep Blue computer at chess, and from the 1960s Underwood & Underwood/Corbis Google+ 1 of 1 IBM is transforming itself from the 1990s, when Garry Kasparov played the IBM Deep Blue computer at chess, and from the 1960s Underwood & Underwood/Corbis Alexandra Frean US Business Editor   chief executive of IBM had a simple message this week for investors questioning whether her company was running out of time to pull off its transformation from computing giant to a provider of software and cloud services. 
“It is working,” Ginni Rometty said. “Look at the results.” Subscribe now
